, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0905\u092c</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0924\u0915</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0917\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0930\u0939\u093e</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0939\u0942\u0901</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092e\u0948\u0902</span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\">....</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<iframe allowfullscreen=\"\" class=\"YOUTUBE-iframe-video\" data-thumbnail-src=\"https://i.ytimg.com/vi/JHzNYaYzzcU/0.jpg\" frameborder=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/JHzNYaYzzcU?feature=player_embedded\" width=\"320\"></iframe></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">SOMEBODY CALLED ME AND SAID\u2014IT IS A LIE THAT ITALIAN\nFIBONACCI COPIED HIS SERIES FROM INDIA. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2010/12/perfect-six-pack-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">I SAID -&nbsp;\nMUCH BEFORE INDIAN SAGES BUILT THE PYRAMIDS , MUCH BEFORE THIEF\nFIBONACCI WAS BORN, THE VEDAS HAD THIS GOLDEN VEDIC SERIES EMBEDDED IN OUR\nSRUTI VERSES.&nbsp; THIS IS A SURE SHOT\nINDICATION THAT VEDAS ( SRUTI IS DIVINE )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\">MY REVELATIONS NOW JUMP TO </span><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">37.5% </span></b><span style=\"font-size: 14pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/10/eight-sided-pyramid-of-giza-egypt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Matrameru, is the field of counting sequences\nsuch as 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8 and so on ( stolen Fibonacci numbers), in their\nprosody studies.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Fibonacci numbers &nbsp;appeared, under the name matrameru (mountain\nof cadence), in the work of the Sanskrit grammarian Pingala ( Chandah-shastra,\nthe Art of Prosody, 500 BC).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Prosody was important in ancient Indian ritual\nbecause of an emphasis on the purity of utterance. The Indian mathematician\nVirahanka (6th century AD) showed how the Fibonacci sequence arose in the\nanalysis of metres with long and short syllables.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The brain is an electrochemical machine that\nprocesses through binary code - zeroes and ones that create patterns of\nexperiences and realities. Reality is a consciousness hologram (algorithm) that\nuses the Fibonacci Sequence to create experiences in which we vicariously\nexperience.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Great Pyramids in Giza, the Parthenon in\nAthens and Chichen Itza in Mexico, Sun Temple at Mesa Verde National Park in\nColorado &nbsp;were made by Indian sages .\nThey all have the vedic&nbsp; golden ratio\n1.618 embedded<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b>THE POST BELOW IS MY MOST RIDICULED POST\u2014BUT IS\nMY BEST .<o:p></o:p></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">1.618 IN GNOMONIC\u2014GREAT CIRCLE \u2013IS NOT A\nCOINCIDENCE .</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The Mesa Verde National Park is in North America\n( once part of Mexico\u2014 Donald Trump does not know this )&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zyjbeQAbAdA/WPHfFJyVvwI/AAAAAAABSjw/VFIDbZJ5rDgQQwSjIynMJa1J9FCAYHtWwCLcB/s1600/imagses.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"433\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zyjbeQAbAdA/WPHfFJyVvwI/AAAAAAABSjw/VFIDbZJ5rDgQQwSjIynMJa1J9FCAYHtWwCLcB/s640/imagses.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Meruprast\u0101ra, ( stolen Pascal's triangle ) is\nalso called as the Halayudha's triangle in books on Vedic mathematics.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">The first five rows of the Pascal's triangle,\nalso called the Halayudha's triangle. Halayudha discusses this and more in his\nSanskrit prosody bhasya on Pingala. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Halayudha ( 300 BC ) a Kerala mathematician wrote\nthe M\u1e5btasa\u00f1j\u012bvan\u012b, &nbsp;a commentary on\nPingala's Chanda\u1e25\u015b\u0101stra ( 500 BC . &nbsp; The latter contains a clear description of\nPascal's triangle (called meru-prastaara).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bAf0uf6OB4c/WPHforbZJ5I/AAAAAAABSj4/2rp_E-cbO1sXGWo7-qWv8LSSRPMnKb2cQCLcB/s1600/250px-PascaldTriangleAnimated2.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bAf0uf6OB4c/WPHforbZJ5I/AAAAAAABSj4/2rp_E-cbO1sXGWo7-qWv8LSSRPMnKb2cQCLcB/s1600/250px-PascaldTriangleAnimated2.gif\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Algorithms enumerate binomial combinations of\nmeters through pratyaya. For a given class (length), the six pratyaya were:--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">prast\u0101ra, the \"table of arrangement\":\na procedure for enumerating (arranging in a table) all metres of the given\nlength,<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">na\u1e63\u1e6da: a procedure for finding a metre given\nits position in the table (without constructing the whole table),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">uddi\u1e63\u1e6da: a procedure for finding the position\nin the table of a given metre (without constructing the whole table),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">laghukriy\u0101 or lagakriy\u0101: calculation of the\nnumber of metres in the table containing a given number of laghu (or guru)\nsyllables,</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">sa\u1e43khy\u0101: calculation of the total number of\nmetres in the table,</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">adhvan: calculation of the space needed to\nwrite down the prast\u0101ra table of a given class (length).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">MUCH BEFORE KERALA MATHEMATICIAN VARAHAMIHIRA\n2660 BC EXPOUNDED PASCALS TRIANGLE<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/08/mihira-muni-great-astrologer-cum.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">Let me quote Wikipedia---<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">QUOTE : Combinatorics[edit]&nbsp; He was among the first mathematicians to\ndiscover a version of what is now known as the Pascal's triangle. He used it to\ncalculate the binomial coefficients.[11][12][13]UNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Var%C4%81hamihira\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Var%C4%81hamihira</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">GERMAN HERMANN GUNDERT STOLE ALMOST ALL OF\nNORTH KERALAs &nbsp;MATH, ASTRONOMY AND SCIENCE WORKS. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">THE GLORY OF KERALA WAS IN NORTH KERALA &nbsp;( MALABAR ) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/12/hermann-gundert-hermann-hesse-and.html</a></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\">In mathematics, THIEF Pascal's triangle is a\ntriangular array of the binomial coefficients.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Pascal's triangle\ndetermines the coefficients which arise in binomial expansions. For an example,\nconsider the expansion<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">(x + y)2 = x2 + 2xy +\ny2 = 1x2y0 + 2x1y1 + 1x0y2.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Notice the coefficients\nare the numbers in row two of Pascal's triangle: 1, 2, 1. In general, when a\nbinomial like x + y is raised to a positive integer power we have:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">(x + y)n = a0xn +\na1xn\u22121y + a2xn\u22122y2 + ... + an\u22121xyn\u22121 + anyn,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">where the coefficients\nai in this expansion are precisely the numbers on row n of Pascal's triangle.\nIn other words,<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">{\\displaystyle a_{i}={n\n\\choose i}.} a_{i}={n \\choose i}.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">This is the binomial\ntheorem.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/01/isaac-newton-calculus-thief-capt-ajit.html</a></span><o:p></o:p><br />\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sY4SlFzIGYQ/WPHnkDjIQOI/AAAAAAABSkM/Obi-hy7vx5QLf_pSSEbvFd9qQE8pSrSGACLcB/s1600/pascalSSs-triangle-fibonacci.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"326\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-sY4SlFzIGYQ/WPHnkDjIQOI/AAAAAAABSkM/Obi-hy7vx5QLf_pSSEbvFd9qQE8pSrSGACLcB/s640/pascalSSs-triangle-fibonacci.gif\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">ABOVE : VARAHAMIHIRAs TRIANGLE</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: white;\">BELOW: VEDIC GOLDEN SPIRAL</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3Q8-zGfWZ0Y/WPHn4jQkKNI/AAAAAAABSkQ/i8JiQGbIYxMjoUjvGMjneWnJeiWLE41UQCLcB/s1600/downSAload.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"397\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3Q8-zGfWZ0Y/WPHn4jQkKNI/AAAAAAABSkQ/i8JiQGbIYxMjoUjvGMjneWnJeiWLE41UQCLcB/s640/downSAload.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>BELOW: VEDIC GOLDEN MEAN --THESE BASTARDS PASCAL/ FIBONACCI / NEWTON etc NEVER EXPECTED TO GET CAUGHT BY A HARDCORE CAPT AJIT VADAKAYIL</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>SHABDA BRAHMAN SOUND , SRUTI OF VEDAS IS DIVINE GEOMETRY WHEN SEEN VISUALLY&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"220\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RaLqC3Px7Ow/WPHp2y_CCSI/AAAAAAABSkk/1038rZ4OamwhKJ9bu56IkAxWKz66ZY-kQCLcB/s400/Wmain-qimg-08f861abcf7cd64476ec49726fddf740-c.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">BELOW: THE GOLDEN VEDIC MEAN IS THE BASIS OF ANCIENT INDIAN SRI YANTRA ( KING MANTRA OM ) WHICH GIVE THE 54 ALPHABETS OF SANSKRIT / MALAYALAM AND THE 108 ELEMENTS OF DIMITRI MENDELEYEEV . &nbsp;</b><br />\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></b>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">INDEED THE COSMOS IS CONSTRUCTED BY SHABDA BRAHMAN&nbsp;</b><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both;
