&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bible reveals to an\nintelligent reader the equinoctial and the ecliptic cut at Taurus \u2013 Aries &nbsp;\u2014Pisces \u2014 &nbsp;Aquarius &nbsp;due to precession is told as lore in the Bible\u2014like\nHindu puranas where cosmic allegories were personalized as mortal gods<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Islam religion was\nstarted by a Kerala Namboodiri , the nephew of the Hindu priest of the Shiva\ntemple at the oasis of Mecca ( a customs post of the Calicut King for the spice\ntrade ) . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2009/07/vedic-practises-in-mecca-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Koran was edited at\nCheraman Perumal mosque \u2013a Shiva temple , part of the Kodungallur university . &nbsp;King of Calicut Cheraman Perumal went to Mecca\nShiva temple to meet Mohammad the prophet. His ship was at Salalah .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">&nbsp;On the way back from Mecca to Salalah ( Oman )\nthe King died .&nbsp; His grave can still be seen\nat Salalah ( </span><span style=\"background-color: white;\">Thiyyajuddin --ruler from clan of Thiyyas </span><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">) \u2014I have been there. </span></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilgrims go to Mecca\nonly for the black stone ( Shiva Lingam ) at the SE corner of Kaaba , installed\nhorizontally , 5 feet above the ground at kissable level. Today kissing is NOT\nallowed. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Many Muslims in India ,\nask themselves\u2014why go to Mecca to kiss a duplicate stone\u2014when we have the\noriginal black meteorite in Indian Shiva temples . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The black stone of\nKaaba was stolen by a Hindu sect and they threw a bag of black floating pumice \u2013which\nis cemented together and is still there . The black pumice floats in water\nwhile an original Shiva Lingam ( containing DNA seed ) weighs heavier than\nsteel.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/the-sack-of-somnath-temple-by-mahmud-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/11/the-sack-of-somnath-temple-by-mahmud-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Parsi religion is an\noffshoot of Sanatana Dharma. &nbsp;They\ninterchanged Devas and Asuras ( Dananva ). The bad forces of Hinduism Asuras\nbecame the good forces of Zoroaster religion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The good forces of\nHindusim Devas became the bad forces of Parsi religion. Parsis were persecuted by\nIslam in Persia and they just came home to india. When Jew Rothschild ruled\nIndia , ungrateful &nbsp;Paris helped the\nwhite invader.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/06/shukracharya-is-ahura-mazda-god-of.html</a><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: In ancient Persia ASURAS ( Danavas ) were gods&nbsp;</b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Slj6pWs6FNs/WPDlFqSyRjI/AAAAAAABSg4/N18S3q9bA9Uv6HQXHztXhwG_jmjUhlq8QCLcB/s1600/Uww2ntitled.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"454\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-Slj6pWs6FNs/WPDlFqSyRjI/AAAAAAABSg4/N18S3q9bA9Uv6HQXHztXhwG_jmjUhlq8QCLcB/s640/Uww2ntitled.png\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sanatan dharma was the\nway of life since the time mankind started having a thought process. It was not\na particular religion at that time but a&nbsp;\ngraceful and spiritual way of life . It was an amazing theory of\npractising and following certain rules and disciplines to balance and progress\nthe life.</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindus have believed in vasudeva kutumbakam which\nshelters everyone but has never imposed itself forcefully or by need and greed.&nbsp; Hindus has always been the most tolerant race-and\nHindusim has been the most tolerant belief system where everyone\u2019s view is\nrespected.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yet&nbsp; the COMMIE media tried to\nportray Hindus as violent savages</span> . It wont work any more.&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since\nages Hindus have always believed that we are &nbsp;souls within a cadaver . This is why even\nbefore a fight to death in ancient wars like Mahabharata we did Namaste to each\nother . Both have a part of Brahman ( god &nbsp;--a ball of of energy ) within them .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The body\nis mortal but we are not. We have taken many births and soul is unborn. &nbsp;This clearly identifies with the law of energy\u2014that\nEnergy can neither be created nor be destroyed; it can only be transferred from\none body to another. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Hindus believe\nthat the entire universal power is within us and we can utilize the human birth\nto evolve and emerge as the supreme power. When the human race does NOT eveolve\nanymore and the feed back from Moksha souls at the sevent astral layer becomes\nstagnant, there will be pralaya \u2013total dissolution . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Change is the only constant.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is explained\nin the Bhagawad Gita.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism\nacknowledges that all beings are equal, despite the diversity in their names\nand forms. They all possess the self which is eternal. Hinduism is has never\never been about rituals or domestic worship or going to temples, it begins from\nthe start of the day and continues in deep sleep of self absorption. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hinduism never degrades anyone but holds its\nhead high as the oldest source of living a life which evolves every moment.\nIndeed we Hindus are the proudest people on the planet .</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/we-hindu-indians-are-proudest-people-on.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/02/we-hindu-indians-are-proudest-people-on.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_226M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"http://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil<br />\nApril 13, 2017 at 6:12 PM<br />\n<br />\nhi cn,<br />\n<br />\nPandu was an albino and was afraid that his children would also be Albinos. In those days being born an Albino was considered a curse from bad karma of previous births.<br />\n<br />\nOne day, while hunting in the forest, Pandu accidentally shot an arrow killing what he thought was a deer, but was actually the coupling Rishi Kindama.<br />\n<br />\nThe sage cursed Pandu that he would die when he became intimate with a woman.<br />\n<br />\nBoth his wives Kunti and Madri were directly affected by the curse on Pandu because they were now unable to bear Pandu's children. However, a boon given to Kunti by Durvasa, enabled her to call upon any God to bear her a child.<br />\n<br />\nPandu knew that his wife Kunti had a son from Surya by the name of Karna ( she never believed Durvasha\u2019s boon would work \u2013she tested )<br />\n<br />\nPandu became adamant that Kunti must use the same divine mantra obtained from Durvasa to have three children\u2014Yudhishthira from Dharma, Bhima from Vayu, and Arjuna from Indra.<br />\n<br />\nAs Kunti and Madri had sister type relations between them; Kunti whole heartedly agreed to share the mantras with Madri. Thus, Madri bore the twins Nakula and Sahadeva of the Ashwini Kumaras<br />\n<br />\nOnce Pandu desired his wife's company, forgetting the rishi' curse and becoming intimate with Madri caused his death.<br />\n<br />\nMadri, filled with REMORSE for being the direct cause of her husband\u2019s death immolated herself on Pandu's funeral pyre.<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b>This is not SATI.<br /><br />This was not a custom.</b></span><br />\n<br />\nCapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Rigveda\ncontains&nbsp; hymn describing cremation\nrites,&nbsp; which narrates the agony of the\nwife of the dead man lay down beside him communicating soul to soul ,&nbsp; but was called upon to return to the land of\nthe living before the body was removed to be carried away to the cremation\nsite.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
