font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_31.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_31.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_2.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_2.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_5.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_5.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_9.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_14.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2016/08/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_17.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>HOW MANY OF YOU THINK OUR PADMA VIBHUSHAN FAKE GURUS SRI SRI RAVISHANKAR AND SADGURU JAGGI VASUDEV, &nbsp;CAN EVEN UNDERSTAND PATANJALIs YOGA SUTRAS &nbsp;( ABOVE IS JUST 10% OF IT )</b></span><br />\n<br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">IF ANY NLP EXPERT ON THIS PLANET CAN EXPLAIN\nWHAT I WROTE ABOVE, I WILL GIVE HIM PURASKAR .&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">I HAVE LEFT IT AT THE LOWEST COMMON\nDENOMINATOR LEVEL.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Indian sages working directly with the\nsubconscious mind provides this leverage, to effectively create profound and\nlong-lasting changes on the mental, emotional and physical level.&nbsp; This is beyond the WEE glasshouse of NLP&nbsp;</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are not based on information from the\npast and they are not contextual. Values are universal. Values transcend\ncontexts because they are based on what is important to us: They arise from the\nexperience of being human.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is possible for our\nbeliefs and values to differ over time as we encounter evidence or have\nexperiences that challenge our previously held views.&nbsp;&nbsp; Conversely our beliefs and values can also\nbe strengthened by experience or evidence. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Knowing the difference\nbetween your beliefs and values can be a little confusing. People use both to\nguide their actions and behavior and to form their attitudes towards different\nthings, but they are essentially different.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---.Beliefs are concepts\nthat we hold to be true.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---.Beliefs may come\nreligion, but not always<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---.Values are ideas that\nwe hold to be important.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---.Values govern the way\nwe behave, communicate and interact with others<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">---.Beliefs and values\ndetermine our attitudes and opinions.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Hindusim values were\ntransmitted through Purana stories. Jew Rothschild knew this and he injected\npoison in our Puranas and got his FAKE mutts and gurus to preach blasphemy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are\naction-oriented, providing fast, simplified judgement calls for certain kinds\nof situation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ANCIENT INDIAN PRINCES\nWERE SENT TO GURUKULS TO IMBIBE VALUES .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">VALUES WERE HARDWIRED INTO THEIR BRAINS BY SIMPLE STORIES FOR WHICH THE\nPRINCES WERE TOLD TO GLEAN MORALS<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/super-panchatantra-capt-ajit-vadakayil.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values affect the choice\nof your friends and partners,&nbsp; the\ninterests you pursue, and how you spend your free time. &nbsp;&nbsp;Values are essential components ,\nhighly-perceptible ingredients that help bind members of social groups and\ncultures together in their common belief systems.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white;\"><b>THIS IS NOT THE BULLSHIT\n\u201c AMERICAN EXCEPTIONALISM TO PROTECT OUR WAY OF LIFE AND THAT OF OUR ALLIES \u201c</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The puranas ( SMRITI ) penned\ndown in 5000 BC&nbsp; illustrating the\ndynamics between knowledge, character, and the ability to execute dharma and\nrespond to situations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Beliefs are\ncontextual.&nbsp;&nbsp; They arise from learned\nexperiences, resulting from the cultural and environmental situations we have\nfaced.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are the \u2018hot\nbuttons\u2019 that drive all your behaviours and are your unconscious motivators and\ndemotivators: you act because of your values. When we use our values to make\ndecisions we focus on what is important to us\u2014what we need to feel a sense of\nwell-being. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As human beings, we all\nhave our own values, beliefs and attitudes that we have developed throughout\nthe course of our lives. Our family, friends, community and the experiences we\nhave had all contribute to our sense of who we are and how we view the world. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values are principles,\nstandards or qualities that an individual or group of people hold in high\nregard. These values guide the way we live our lives and the decisions we make<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Values can influence\nmany of the judgments. Natural Justice emanated from values. Our Collegium\njudges lack values and hence the spirit to deliver natural justice within the\nperimeter of context. It is a total disgrace.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This is why we must not have\nLOSER LAWYER TURNED COLLEGIUM JUDGES ( like JNU Commie Collegium professors )<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">An attitude is a belief\nabout something. It usually describes what we think is the \u2018proper\u2019 way of\ndoing something.. Sometimes our own attitudes can make us blind to other\npeople\u2019s values, opinions and needs. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You will need to be\naware of your own personal values, beliefs and attitudes and how they might\nimpact on your work.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our attitudes develop\nover time and not only reflect where we have come from i.e. the influence\nfamily, friends and experiences have had on our attitudes, but also how we will\nproceed with our life in the future. Attitudes are therefore a powerful element\nin our life, are long enduring and hard to change\u2014but not impossible!&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mentors\ncan mold attitudes. I was a mentor at sea.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP therapy works on\nthe principle that your memories are arranged along a time line, and by\nchanging a memory along this time line you can release thehold of some\nmemories, which in turn helps you to gain more control over your reactions to\nevents and create more options in your life.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>MY LEFT BALL !</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WANNA HAVE SOME FUN\nWITH A NLP METHOD DEVICES BY CUNTS ?&nbsp;\nCOME ON MAAAAN HAVE SOME FUN !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">QUOTE :&nbsp; However, you find yourself let down by poor\nhealth. You may decide that having good health is more important for you than\nfun and decide to make a swap in your hierarchy. You can do so by using the\nfollowing technique:--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">1. When you think of\nfun, notice the picture you make in terms of the following:<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Size<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Colour/black and white<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Position<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Still or movie<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Focused or hazy<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">Now\u2014ENTER THE DRAGON\nNLP\u2014 &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">TANG TEH DAAAAAANG !</span></b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><br /></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">2. Notice the picture\nyou make when you think of health.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">3. Swap the qualities\nof the images.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;As with changing the picture qualities of a\nbelief altering the qualities of the picture you have for health to make it thesame\nas the one you have for fun moves health up and places it at thesame level as\nfun. Now change the picture for fun so that it has the samequalities as the one\nyou had for health. This process moves fun down tothe previous level of health.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Now that you\u2019ve experienced working with\npictures, try changing the hierarchyof your values by altering the sounds and\nfeelings you may experience.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Daydreaming Your Future\nRealityContrary to what your school teachers may have told you when they saw\nyougazing out of the classroom window, allowing your mind to wander can be apowerful\nfirst step in achieving your goals. By using the techniques describedin earlier\nsections of this chapter, you can discover your heart\u2019s desire andtake the\nfirst steps towards achieving it \u2013 all by daydreaming.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Give yourself permission to dream and play.\nWhat would you want to succeedat if a fairy godmother came and gave you one\nwish? Imagine that you haveall the influence, contacts, and resources that you\nneed to fulfil your deepestdesire. Got your goal? <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Now follow these steps:--<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">1. Make a list of\nwhat\u2019s important to you about your goal, all the reasons why you want it, and\nput them in order of importance.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Are you surprised by your values? Did you\nrealise something you thought important wasn\u2019t that important after all, and\ndid you think of a value that may have been missing in the beginning?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;If you\u2019re not sure how to do this exercise,\nrefer to the section \u2018Eliciting your values\u2019 earlier in this chapter.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">2. Now, while still\ndaydreaming, imagine floating out of your body and into the future, to a time\nwhen you may have achieved this goal.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">3. Notice the pictures,\nsounds, and feelings, and manipulate them.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Can you make these stronger, more vibrant, and\nthen even more so?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">4. From the place in\nthe future, turn and look back to now and let your unconscious mind notice what\nit needs to know about and help you do in order for you to achieve your goal.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">&nbsp;Remember to notice what the first step would\nbe!<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">5. When you\u2019ve savoured\nthe dream fully, come back and take that firststep!<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">You may surprise\nyourself!<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">UNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">SAAR -- DOUBT AAH GAYA \u2013<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\"><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\">WHILE WE DO THESE NLP GYMNASTICS\nIN OUR MANN MANDIR,&nbsp;-- &nbsp;SHOULD WE CONTINUE KEEPING A FINGER IN OUR\nASSHOLE&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;( OR TWAT AS THE CASE MAY BE ) &nbsp;\u2013 YOU </span><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\"><b>NLP &nbsp;CUNTS !</b></span></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pF2OtXpMUgE/WOy0NjqicaI/AAAAAAABSYw/FVFwVLXByLcpZJlzTgnGAyjRNyY31WocgCLcB/s1600/dowWnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-pF2OtXpMUgE/WOy0NjqicaI/AAAAAAABSYw/FVFwVLXByLcpZJlzTgnGAyjRNyY31WocgCLcB/s400/dowWnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">LET ME TELL YOU ONE THING<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IF ANYBODY ON MY SHIP HAD&nbsp; USED NLP TECHNIQUES ON ME , I WOULD&nbsp; HAVE KICKED HIS ASS , KICKED IT GOOD,&nbsp; STOPPED HIS WAGES ON THE SPOT AND THEN KICKED\nHIM OUT AT THE NEXT PORT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">IN A TIGHTLY KIT TEAM , WHOSE LIFE DEPENDS ON\nEACH OTHER , WE HAVE NO ROOM FOR NLP SHIT</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 200%;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">BE YOURSELF !</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3;\">QUOTE:&nbsp; NLP teaches the ability to calibrate or\n'read' people. This involves the ability to interpret changes in muscle tone,\nskin colour and shininess, lower lip size ( HOW ABOUT PRICK SIZE ? ) and\nbreathing rate and location. The NLP practitioner uses these and other\nindications to determine what effect they are having on other people. This\ninformation serves as feedback as to whether the other person is in the desired\nstate. An important and often overlooked point is to know to stop when the\nother person is in the state that you desire.&nbsp;\nOperational principle of NLP is to vary your behaviour until you get the\nresponse you want. UNQUOTE</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Insecure leaders that\ndisplay low EQ become defensive and take it personally whenever they encounter\nanything that they perceive as criticism or a challenge to their authority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A secure leader with\nhigh emotional intelligence strives to listen, show true empathy and understand\nwhat is the underlying reasoning behind behaviours and actions of those they\nare responsible for managing.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They listen before they respond and if they don\u2019t\nunderstand something they will proceed to ask open ended questions that are meant\nto gather more information to gain as strong an understanding as they possibly\ncan.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In contrast to leaders\nwith low emotional intelligence, they won\u2019t consider everything to be about\nthemselves, but look for ways to make the situation better for everyone\ninvolved. While possessing self-confidence, high EQ leaders do not have a need\nto portray their own importance or value.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each side of your brain\ncontains four lobes. The frontal lobe is important for cognitive functions and\ncontrol of voluntary movement or activity. The parietal lobe processes\ninformation about temperature, taste, touch and movement, while the occipital\nlobe is primarily responsible for vision. The temporal lobe processes memories,\nintegrating them with sensations of taste, sound, sight and touch<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m1Unl0tcXcA/WOzhfBd_m8I/AAAAAAABSZA/HXmX7oDyn0gZ2dH7z7cAfqD9OkIWhK0RQCLcB/s1600/ds00266_ds00810_im0344R0_bn7_lobesthu_jpg.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-m1Unl0tcXcA/WOzhfBd_m8I/AAAAAAABSZA/HXmX7oDyn0gZ2dH7z7cAfqD9OkIWhK0RQCLcB/s400/ds00266_ds00810_im0344R0_bn7_lobesthu_jpg.JPG\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: white; color: red; font-size: large;\">Some NLP experts try to\nDAZZLE YOU WITH BRILLIANCE \u2013they cry NLP addresses metaphorical behavior and\nspeech, especially building upon the methods used in <b>Freud's Interpretation of\nDreams</b></span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BUT HEY, JEW SIGMUND FREUD\nWAS A MAD MAN !&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FREUD ROSE THAT FAR\nONLY BECAUSE HE WAS A JEW !!<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Virtually no\ninstitution in any discipline would dare use Freud as a credible source. &nbsp;But I was most amused to read a Collegium\nJudge ( an asshole ) ruling ending with \u201cFreud would have agreed \u201c. &nbsp;He hoped to be branded an erudite intellectual.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s no scientific\nevidence in support of the idea that boys lust after their mothers and hate\ntheir fathers. He was totally, utterly wrong about gender. And his notion of\n\u201cpenis envy\u201d is now both laughable and tragic.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s no proof of the\nid, ego, or superego. There\u2019s also no evidence to support the notion that human\ndevelopment proceeds through oral, anal, phallic, and genital stages. Nor that\nthe interference, or arresting, of these stages leads to specific developmental\nmanifestations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freud, called the\nfather of psychoanalysis &nbsp;theorized that\nhomosexuality was a failure to reconcile the anal phase, or the Oedipal phase.\nWhich is nonsense. He also argued that only \u201cmature\u201d women could orgasm from\nvaginal sex, and that women who could only climax via clitoral stimulation were\nsomehow stunted, stuck at a latent phase. Again, KOSHER &nbsp;nonsense.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\u2019s &nbsp;no evidence that Freudian psychotherapy\n(including psychoanalysis and \u201cfree association\u201d) is any better than others,\nincluding Skinnerian behavioral therapy (which is diametrically opposed to\nFreudianism in terms of methodology), systematic desensitization, or\nassertiveness training.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Freud did NOT believe in\nre-birth like a Hindu. All his suppressed memories theories are absolute\ngarbage<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All Freud\u2019s fans must\nshove Oedipal and Electra up their assholes and feel good about it. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the oldest\ntricks in the illusionists' book is to relax members of an audience so that\nthey lose concentration and fail to spot \"secret actions\".&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a\nperformer's quick hands are setting up the next jaw-dropping feat of magic,\nmost of the audience will have their eyes closed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Blinking frequently occurs\nwhen attention is lowered, for instance during pauses in conversations and at\nthe end of film scenes..&nbsp;\nAttention-relaxing moments occur when people laugh or clap.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-decoration-line: none;\">April 9, 2017 at 11:20 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_28MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nHIS NAME IS STEVEN FRAYNE-- A JEW-- WITH CHRONS DISEASE<br />\n<br />\nHE IS A CONMAN -IN THE GARB OF A MAGICIAN<br />\n<br />\nWHEN MY ELDER SON WAS IN 2ND STANDARD , HI SCHOOL HELD A \"SCIENCE EXHIBITION\"<br />\n<br />\nSINCE THE MUSLIM PRINCIPAL TREATED ME AND MY WIFE AS THE CATs WHISKERS --I HAD ASKED HIM TO DO TRICKS WITH MIRRORS. &nbsp; IT WAS THE BIGGEST DRAW .<br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7Z2Q56OXiUM</span><br />\n<br />\nTHE PANDAVA PALACE AT INDRAPRASTA MADE BY MAYA DANAVA WAS A PALACE OF ILLUSIONS -USING MIRRORS AND WATER REFLECTION.<br />\n<br />\nDURYODHANA WAS TRICKED TO FALL IN A POOL OF WATER - DRAUPADI LAUGHED LOUDLY CRYING \"SON OF BLIND PARENTS IS ALSO BLIND \" AND THIS CAUSED MAHABHARATA WAR</div>\n<div style=\"text-align: left;\">\n<b><span style=\"color: blue;\">WHEN A MAGICIANS DOES A TRICK ALL YOU HAVE TO SAY IS --WHY ARE YOU CONNING US?</span></b></div>\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</li>\n</span></ol>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedGqVWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<span id=\"bc_0_29b+seedGqVWD\" kind=\"d\">\n</span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9Ffp36UHIxA/WOp1FwYs0rI/AAAAAAABSTY/rsNcgjyLAv8dkjFW8CA8UmppGwUO21IRQCLcB/s1600/7A7-04.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-9Ffp36UHIxA/WOp1FwYs0rI/AAAAAAABSTY/rsNcgjyLAv8dkjFW8CA8UmppGwUO21IRQCLcB/s640/7A7-04.jpg\" width=\"480\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">NLP involves doing\nwhatever you can to make a person believe they\u2019re going to change, and as such\nrelies heavily upon your combined preconceptions. It uses some cunning quirks\nof language and exploits behavioural patterns to deepen a person\u2019s\nresponsiveness to suggestion.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One of the central beliefs of NLP is that\neveryone can be \u2018reprogrammed\u2019, it will just requires the right intervention.\nThat also makes it pseudoscience, because if a practitioner has an ineffective\ninteraction with a client, it can be disregarded as \u2018just not right for them\u2019.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cNeuro-Linguistic\nProgramming n. a model of interpersonal communication chiefly concerned with\nthe relationship between successful patterns of behaviour and the subjective\nexperiences (esp. patterns of thought) underlying them; a system of alternative\ntherapy based on this which seeks to educate people in self-awareness and\neffective communication, and to change their patterns of mental and emotional\nbehaviour.\u201d \u2013 [<span style=\"background-color: white;\">Oxford English Dictionary</span>]<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">WHAT NOBODY WRITES IS\nTHAT NLP IS A PONZI PYRAMID SCHEME \u2013 A CON GAME</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; color: blue; font-size: large;\">NLP is taught in a\npyramid structure, with the more advanced techniques reserved for\nmulti-thousand-dollar seminars.&nbsp; Only the\nTOP kosher layers makes the moolah like in Amway.</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/amway-merchants-of-pipe-dreams-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/03/amway-merchants-of-pipe-dreams-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pyramid schemes and\nPonzi schemes share many similar characteristics in which unsuspecting\nindividuals are fooled by unscrupulous investors who promise extraordinary\nreturns. However, in contrast to a regular investment, these types of schemes\ncan offer consistent \"profits\" only as long as the number of\ninvestors continues to increase.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ponzi and pyramid schemes are self sustaining\nas long as cash outflows can be matched by monetary inflows. The basic\ndifference arises in the type of products that schemers offer their clients and\nthe structure of the two ploys.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ponzi schemes are based\non fraudulent investment management services \u2013 basically investors contribute\nmoney to the \"portfolio manager\" who promises them a high return, and\nthen when those investors want their money back they are paid out with the\nincoming funds contributed by later investors.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The person organizing this type\nof fraud is in charge of controlling the entire operation; they merely transfer\nfunds from one client to another and forgo any real investment activities.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand, a\npyramid scheme is structured so that the initial schemer must recruit other\ninvestors who will continue to recruit other investors and those investors will\nthen continue to recruit additional investors and so on.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes there will\nbe an incentive that is presented as an investment opportunity, such as the\nright to sell a particular product. Each investor pays the person who recruited\nthem for the chance to sell this item. The recipient must share the proceeds\nwith those at the higher levels of the pyramid structure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Below: The CUNTS who write this book must be given PURASKAAAR -- a kick on their asses !&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-size: large;\">Imagine NLP conmen thinking that they are &nbsp;Epistemologists like our Maharishis ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/---oJwfPaFvo/WOqE8K0r0sI/AAAAAAABSTo/BGstUNvlt6gJG8GuYvHrwDfyiV_tE3bOgCLcB/s1600/51qnPc8wcVL._SX3ww212_BO1%252C204%252C203%252C200_.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/---oJwfPaFvo/WOqE8K0r0sI/AAAAAAABSTo/BGstUNvlt6gJG8GuYvHrwDfyiV_tE3bOgCLcB/s640/51qnPc8wcVL._SX3ww212_BO1%252C204%252C203%252C200_.jpg\" width=\"402\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Epistemology in Indian\nphilosophy ( 5000 BC ) is divided into six pramanas. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">The six pramanas as\ncorrect means of accurate knowledge and to truths are:--</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pratyak\u1e63a (perception),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anum\u0101\u1e47a (inference),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Upam\u0101\u1e47a (comparison and\nanalogy),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Arth\u0101patti\n(postulation, derivation from circumstances),<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Anupalabdi\n(non-perception, negative/cognitive proof) and<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u015aabda (word, testimony\nof past or present reliable experts).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Each of these are\nfurther categorized in terms of conditionality, completeness, confidence and\npossibility of error, by each school of Indian philosophies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white historian\nmust know that Greek philosophy was stolen from Indian philosophy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prama\u1e47a refers to\nepistemology in Vedanta--&nbsp; Yukti&nbsp; which means active application of epistemology\nor what one already knows, innovation, clever expedients or connections,\nmethodological or reasoning trick, joining together, application of\ncontrivance, means, method, novelty or device to more efficiently achieve a\npurpose.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The focus of Pramana is\nhow correct knowledge can be acquired, how one knows, how one doesn't, and to\nwhat extent knowledge pertinent about someone or something can be acquired<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In pram\u0101\u1e47a, \u201cknowledge\nsources.\u201d--the principal candidates are perception, inference, and testimony.\nThe central notion throughout classical Indian epistemology is the \u201cknowledge\nsource,\u201d pram\u0101\u1e47a, which is a process of veridical-cognition generation.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prama\u1e47a concept is\nderived from the Sanskrit root, prama which means \"correct notion, true\nknowledge, basis, foundation, accurate notion\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yukti and Pramana are\ndiscussed together in some Indian texts, with Yukti described as active process\nof gaining knowledge in contrast to passive process of gaining knowledge\nthrough observation/ perception.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The texts on Pramana,\nparticularly by Samkhya, Yoga and Advaita Vedanta schools of Hinduism, include\nin their meaning and scope \"Theories of Errors\", that is why human\nbeings make error and reach incorrect knowledge, how can one know if one is\nwrong, and if so, how can one discover whether one's epistemic method was\nflawed, or one's conclusion (truth) was flawed, in order to revise oneself and\nreach correct knowledge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In some texts such as\nby Vedavyasa, ten pramanas are discussed.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nVedanta gave importance to circumstantial implication (arth\u0101patti),\nwhich appeals to common sense (e.g., one does not see the sun move from minute\nto minute, but, as it is in a different place at different times of day, one\nmust conclude that either earth or sun has moved.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word \u2018pram\u0101\u1e47a\u2019\n(\u201cknowledge source\u201d) along with the words used for individual knowledge\nsources, for perception and so on, are commonly used such that the truth of the\nresultant cognition is implied.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This runs counter to Western &nbsp;usage.</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The knowledge,\nperceived by the mind and sense organs is known as Pratyaksha. The means of\nperceiving the knowledge is known as Pratyaksha Pramana. In this case,\nknowledge is the result and the contact of the object and the sense organs is\nnothing but means of knowledge.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The instrumental cause of a true cognition is\ncalled \u2018 pramana \u2019. A pramana theory is one which theorizes about the (causal)\nmodes by which true cognitions are acquired and their truth claims validated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Chomsky,\nthe mind comprises an extensive cluster of innate \u201cmodules,\u201d one of which is\nlanguage. Each module operates automatically, independently of individual\ncontrol, on the basis of a distinct, domain-specific set of rules that take\ndeterminate inputs from some modules and yield determinate outputs for others. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In earlier work these\noperations were called \u201cderivations\u201d; more recently they have been called\n\u201ccomputations.\u201d The various modules interact in complex ways to yield\nperception, thought, and a large number of other cognitive products.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For example, a bee\u2019s\ngenome does not have to direct it to build hives in a hexagonal lattice. The\nlattice is a requirement imposed by physics, since this structure is the most\nstable and efficient of the relevant sort. Analogous points can be made about\nthe growth, structure, and operation of the human brain</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">SORRY CUNT CHOMSKY\nPAAJI &nbsp;, &nbsp;THIS IS SHABDA BRAHMAN AT WORK</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , serif; font-size: 14pt; line-height: 200%;\">AN NLP EXPERT CAN NEVER EVER BE A CHANGE\nMANAGER<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 200%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">QUOTE :</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\"> </span></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><span style=\"color: purple;\">Brenda has a much loved, only daughter, Mary.\nBy the age of ten, Mary was a little spoiled because she arrived after Brenda\nand her husband had given up hope of ever having a child. Mary was prone to throwing\ntantrums the likes of which you\u2019re extremely fortunate not to experience. Mary thrashed\nabout on the floor, screaming and flailing her arms and legs. Brenda made no\nprogress with Mary\u2019s tantrums until one day, when Mary was on the floor\nexercising her lungs with total abandonment, the longsuffering Brenda took some\nmetal pans out of a cupboard and joined Mary on the floor. Brenda banged the\npots on the wooden floor and kicked and screamed even better and louder than\nMary. Guess what? Mary lay still in stunned astonishment, staring at her\nmother. She decided there and then that her mother was the more expert\n\u2018tantrummer\u2019 and that she would lose the tantrum contest every time. She\nrealised that pursuing this particular course of action was futile and the\ntantrums stopped from that moment. Brenda took control of her interaction with\nMary by displaying the greater flexibility of behaviour. </span>: UNQUOTE</span><br />\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></span>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">MAKING A CHOOT OUT OF\nYOUR OWN CHILD &nbsp;\u2013 &nbsp;WILL BACKFIRE SOONER THAN LATER.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt;\">ONE DAY THE CHILD WILL BECOME STRONG AND YOU WILL\nBECOME WEAK .. AT THAT TIME MATTERS REVERSE WITH COMPOUND INTEREST \u2026</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
